Create Directory

Create several directories with different names.

Args:

  • base_path : path to base directory
  • dir_list : list of directory names to be created

Return:

  • None
{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

mkDir[source]

mkDir(base_path:Path, dir_list:list)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

additionalMssg[source]

additionalMssg(count:int)

{% endraw %}

File Count

Count number of files within a directory.

Args:

  • path_dir : path to directory

Return:

  • int
{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

fileCount[source]

fileCount(path_dir:Path)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

listFile[source]

listFile(path_dir:Path)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

itemize[source]

itemize(path_dir:Path)

{% endraw %}

Remove File

Remove single file, example: ".txt", ".py", etc).

Args:

  • id : file number from showDirInf() output
  • path_dir : path to directory

Return:

  • None
{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

rmFile[source]

rmFile(id:list, path_dir:Path)

{% endraw %}

Remove File w/ Specific Extension

Remove any files with a specific extension, for example: ".txt".

Args:

  • path_dir : path to directory
  • extension : extension type

Return:

  • None
{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

rmFileExt[source]

rmFileExt(path_dir:Path, extension:str)

{% endraw %}

Remove Directory

Remove unwanted directory or subdirectory, for example: Colab autosave generated folder, ".ipynb_checkpoint".

Args:

  • path_dir : path to directory
  • dir : directory name

Return:

  • None
{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

rmDir[source]

rmDir(path_dir:Path, dir:str)

{% endraw %}

Show Directory Information

Show file paths, names, types and indicate wheather to remove.

Args:

  • path_dir : path to image directory
  • suffix_list : list of acceptable image suffixes or extensions(remove if not listed)

Return:

  • None
{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

showDirInf[source]

showDirInf(path_dir:Path, suffix_list:list=['.jpg', '.jpeg', '.png'])

{% endraw %}
